documentation.text:
@notice Thrown when a renewal is attempted before the cooldown period has elapsed.
 @param retryAfter The earliest timestamp at which retry is permitted.
@notice Thrown when an invalid cooldown period is set (below minimum safe threshold).
@notice Thrown when caller is not the contract owner.

@dev Configurable cooldown period. Settable by owner only.
      Using uint48 so it can be packed if needed; casting is explicit.
@dev Core per-user state. Packed struct saves gas on every read/write.

@dev Storage gap for upgrade-safe contracts (EIP-1967 proxy pattern).
      Reserve 49 slots so future variables don't corrupt existing layout.

@notice Returns the earliest timestamp at which `subscriber` may renew.
         Returns 0 if they have never attempted (can renew immediately).
@notice Returns whether a subscriber is currently in cooldown.

{"compiler":{"version":"0.8.20+commit.a1b79de6"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint48","name":"_cooldownPeriod","type":"uint48"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"constructor"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"retryAfter","type":"uint256"}],"name":"CooldownNotElapsed","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"provided","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"minimum","type":"uint256"}],"name":"InvalidCooldownPeriod","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"Unauthorized","type":"error"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint48","name":"oldPeriod","type":"uint48"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint48","name":"newPeriod","type":"uint48"}],"name":"CooldownPeriodUpdated","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"subscriber","type":"address"}],"name":"CooldownReset","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"subscriber","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint48","name":"timestamp","type":"uint48"}],"name":"RenewalAttempted","type":"event"},{"inputs":[],"name":"MIN_COOLDOWN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint48","name":"","type":"uint48"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"attemptRenewal","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"cooldownPeriod","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint48","name":"","type":"uint48"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_owner","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint48","name":"_cooldownPeriod","type":"uint48"}],"name":"initialize","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"subscriber","type":"address"}],"name":"isInCooldown","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"subscriber","type":"address"}],"name":"nextRenewalTimestamp","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"owner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"subscriber","type":"address"}],"name":"resetCooldown","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint48","name":"newPeriod","type":"uint48"}],"name":"setCooldownPeriod","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"errors":{"CooldownNotElapsed(uint256)":[{"params":{"retryAfter":"The earliest timestamp at which retry is permitted."}}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"attemptRenewal()":{"details":"Same-block race: if two txs from the same address land in one block,      they share block.timestamp. The first to be executed writes the state;      the second reads `lastAttemptTimestamp == block.timestamp`, which fails      `block.timestamp > lastAttemptTimestamp + cooldownPeriod` (strict >).      Result: only one succeeds per block. This is the desired behavior."},"constructor":{"details":"Standard constructor. For proxy deployments, disable this and use      `initialize()` instead (OpenZeppelin Initializable pattern).","params":{"_cooldownPeriod":"Initial cooldown in seconds (must be >= MIN_COOLDOWN)."}},"resetCooldown(address)":{"details":"Use with caution. For authorized account recoveries only.      Consider requiring governance approval for production.","params":{"subscriber":"The address to reset."}},"setCooldownPeriod(uint48)":{"details":"Trade-off: allowing admin to reduce cooldown could be abused.      Consider adding a timelock or DAO governance for production use.","params":{"newPeriod":"New cooldown in seconds. Must be >= MIN_COOLDOWN."}}},"stateVariables":{"MIN_COOLDOWN":{"details":"Minimum cooldown: 60s. Below this, miner timestamp manipulation      (~15s window) becomes a non-trivial percentage of the cooldown,      undermining the guarantee."},"__gap":{"details":"Storage gap for upgrade-safe contracts (EIP-1967 proxy pattern).      Reserve 49 slots so future variables don't corrupt existing layout."},"_subscribers":{"details":"Core per-user state. Packed struct saves gas on every read/write."},"cooldownPeriod":{"details":"Configurable cooldown period. Settable by owner only.      Using uint48 so it can be packed if needed; casting is explicit."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"CooldownNotElapsed(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a renewal is attempted before the cooldown period has elapsed."}],"InvalidCooldownPeriod(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when an invalid cooldown period is set (below minimum safe threshold)."}],"Unauthorized()":[{"notice":"Thrown when caller is not the contract owner."}]},"kind":"user","methods":{"attemptRenewal()":{"notice":"Attempt a renewal. Reverts if called within the cooldown window. CEI Pattern enforced:   1. CHECK  \u2014 verify cooldown has elapsed (or first attempt)   2. EFFECT \u2014 update timestamp before any external interaction   3. INTERACT \u2014 emit event (safe; no external calls here)"},"initialize(address,uint48)":{"notice":"Initializer for proxy-upgradeable deployments.         Call this instead of constructor when deploying behind a proxy.         Add `initializer` modifier from OpenZeppelin if using their library."},"isInCooldown(address)":{"notice":"Returns whether a subscriber is currently in cooldown."},"nextRenewalTimestamp(address)":{"notice":"Returns the earliest timestamp at which `subscriber` may renew.         Returns 0 if they have never attempted (can renew immediately)."},"resetCooldown(address)":{"notice":"Emergency function: reset a user's cooldown (admin only)."},"setCooldownPeriod(uint48)":{"notice":"Update the cooldown period. Only callable by owner."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/CooldownRenewal.sol":"CooldownRenewal"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/CooldownRenewal.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1d1f88f1d601fae96f657d87bd664c270dec6c396bea446a3f36622810b4c44c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://06e2b2306d52d37c1c410141749af98515d7da03987f33b57b1b3c60647f85fd","dweb:/ipfs/QmXmKGNE4itmp8qThnatQcgLxFqvwmDyynC6NEc7pQNEmv"]}},"version":1}
